channel.title: [317] How do i make somewhere Wilderness? [317]
channel.description:
HOW DO I MAKE A PLACE WILDERNESS??
PLEASE ANSWER :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused:

item.title: [317] How do i make somewhere Wilderness? [317]
item.dc:creator: @koopa_king koopa king
item.description:
@koopa_king wrote:

What source are you using?

If you are using DeltaScape, search

public boolean isInWilderness

I think you have to edit those.

Read full topic
item.source: [317] How do i make somewhere Wilderness? [317]

item.title: [317] How do i make somewhere Wilderness? [317]
item.dc:creator: @cowbell cowbell
item.description:
@cowbell wrote:

ok so where do i find this so called nonWild? in client.java cuz i dont see

Read full topic
item.source: [317] How do i make somewhere Wilderness? [317]

item.title: [317] How do i make somewhere Wilderness? [317]
item.dc:creator: @koopa_king koopa king
item.description:
@koopa_king wrote:

Sorry, my one post wasn’t so clear.
I am assuming you want the spot beyond the gates in Edgeville dungeon to be wild? Am I correct?
If so, you need to make the area before the gates non-wild if they are currently wild.
If the area beyond the gates is safe, you need to make them wild.
To edit these, search your nonWild method

public boolean nonWild()

I will let you mess around with the method. Just make sure you backup your server before you do anything in case if you get errors and you don’t know what you did wrong.

Read full topic
item.source: [317] How do i make somewhere Wilderness? [317]

item.title: [317] How do i make somewhere Wilderness? [317]
item.dc:creator: @Avalon Avalon
item.description:
@Avalon wrote:

cowbell:

so is that how i make edgevill duegon wilderness? or is that the way to take wild away??? Im Confused…

All areas are wilderness by default, as Koopa said. If it is not wilderness, it means you specified the area to be non-wild under the nonWild method, as Koopa also said. Check under that method and check to see if any of the coordinates set the area as non-wild, if so, remove them.

Read full topic
item.source: [317] How do i make somewhere Wilderness? [317]

item.title: [317] How do i make somewhere Wilderness? [317]
item.dc:creator: @cowbell cowbell
item.description:
@cowbell wrote:

[quote=“koopa king, post:4, topic:277060”]Like, once you go past the gates? If so, then you have to make the area that is currently wild to be non-wild. And if it already safe, you have to go into your client.java and search

public boolean nonWild()

And then edit the values for edgeville dungeon to your preferences.[/quote]

so is that how i make edgevill duegon wilderness? or is that the way to take wild away??? Im Confused…

item.title: [317] How do i make somewhere Wilderness? [317]
item.dc:creator: @koopa_king koopa king
item.description:
@koopa_king wrote:

Like, once you go past the gates? If so, then you have to make the area that is currently wild to be non-wild. And if it already safe, you have to go into your client.java and search

public boolean nonWild()

And then edit the values for edgeville dungeon to your preferences.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] How do i make somewhere Wilderness? [317]
item.dc:creator: @koopa_king koopa king
item.description:
@koopa_king wrote:

Everything is automatically wilderness. The only thing you can do is make things non-wild.
